contents.title: Giffyglyph's Wicked Warlock
contents.blurb:
You are a warlock, a seeker of forbidden knowledge—and you have made questionable bargains with an otherworldly patron. But as you strike out into the world, what kind of warlock will you be?

Are you an archivist, scouring the land for ancient secrets and hidden lore? Are you a dominator, using eldritch power to subdue and dominate your enemies? Or are you a destroyer, bringing death and destruction with sinister magics?

Whatever your focus, Giffyglyph's Wicked Warlock introduces new mechanics, features, and subclasses for your D&D 5e character. Add new 1st-10th level options to your campaign and head out into adventure.
features: Revised rules, features, and mechanics for levels 1-10.
Recover power with a sacrificial bargain.
Updated pacts and invocations—gain formidable power from your patron and your bargain.
Pact of the Wand—devastate your enemies with raw, destructive power.
New subclasses and subclass options—choose your specialty from the very first level.
Recover your strength with a long rest.
